message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $20,000. I believe it offers significant value, even beyond its worth to me.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I understand the value of the product, but I am only willing to pay up to $10,000 for it. I hope we can come to an agreement.
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $20,000 is significantly below its true value. How about we meet in the middle at $17,000?

Thank you for considering my previous offer, Alice. While I understand the value of the product, I am still unable to meet you at $17,000. I would like to propose $14,000 as a fair price for the product.
